title: 'Blazing' - A new limited edition print
content:
Hello all,

I'm very pleased to say that I have produced a new art print.

The print is called 'Blazing' and is available exclusively from Pictures on Walls.  
POW is a big gallery selling the work of some extremely talented and established artists including Banksy and Antony Micallef, so I think it's a very positive development.

It's an ambigram, which means you can read it both ways up. Details here:

[www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105432/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk")  
 [www.picturesonwalls.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105432/http:/www.picturesonwalls.com/ "www.picturesonwalls.com")
author: Seb Lester
